title: I've worked every day for 3+ years. (On top of school.)
body: So it really bugs me when white people talk about "days off" or not getting any as if they somehow deserve it just for having a job. You work to make money, not to get days off. Be thankful you even have a job and you want "days off" then don't get a fucking job in the first place. That way you can have all the days off you want.
